content.question: Which of the following best describes the growth in the number of registered users for the first eight years of the applicationâ€™s existence?

choices.label: The number of registered users increased at about a constant rate each year for all eight years.
The number of registered users increased at about a constant rate for years 1 to 5 and then about doubled each year after that.
The number of registered users about doubled each year for years 1 to 5 and then increased at about a constant rate after that.
The number of registered users about doubled each year for all eight years.

content.answer: The number of registered users about doubled each year for years 1 to 5 and then increased at about a constant rate after that.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how knowledge can be generated from data.
